answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some areas that have a utility rate advisory committee. I included a list of those places and their homepages below. 
Sacramento, CA:
http://www.cityofsacramento.org/utilities/about-us/rac.cfm
West Linn, OR: Their site includes specific meeting documents and their charter.
http://westlinnoregon.gov/finance/utility-advisory-board
Leesburg, VA:
http://www.leesburgva.org/index.aspx?page=1319
Marco Island, FL: Their committee is very new and was only approved last year. 
http://www.cityofmarcoisland.com/index.aspx?page=59
Does anyone have a utility rate advisory committee in place?
I hope these help!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
